channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国的增长模式使北京陷入更多贸易冲突
item.description: Brussels' trade policy is now also turning increasingly protective against the global ramifications of China's production-focused, debt-driven development model.翻译:布鲁塞尔的贸易政策现在也变得越来越保护性，以防范中国以生产为中心、债务驱动的发展模式对全球的影响。
item.author: Joe Cash, Christoph Steitz

item.title: 路透调查显示，台湾第四季度经济增长因内需和出口反弹而​​回升
item.description: Taiwan's trade-dependent economy likely grew faster in the fourth quarter than the third thanks to strong domestic consumption and a rebound in exports, a Reuters poll showed on Monday.翻译:路透周一的一项民意调查显示，由于国内消费强劲和出口反弹，台湾依赖贸易的经济第四季度的增长可能快于第三季度。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯表示海上合作是越南访问的基石
item.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Monday said talks on maritime cooperation between his country and Vietnam would be one of the cornerstones forged in a strategic partnership with its Southeast Asian neighbour.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯周一表示，菲律宾与越南之间的海上合作会谈将成为与东南亚邻国建立战略伙伴关系的基石之一。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 反应：中国恒大被香港法院下令清算
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Monday ordered the liquidation of China Evergrande Group , a move likely to send ripples through China's crumbling financial markets as policymakers scramble to contain the deepening crisis.翻译:香港一家法院周一下令对中国恒大集团进行清算，此举可能会在中国摇摇欲坠的金融市场中引发连锁反应，因为政策制定者正忙于遏制日益加深的危机。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解说：恒大被勒令清算后接下来会发生什么？
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Monday ordered China Evergrande , the world's most indebted developer, to be liquidated.翻译:香港一家法院周一下令对全球负债最重的开发商中国恒大进行清算。
item.author: Clare Jim, Scott Murdoch

item.title: 时间表：恒大危机恶化
item.description: A Hong Kong court ordered the liquidation of China Evergrande Group on Monday.翻译:香港法院周一下令对中国恒大集团进行清算。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 反应：香港法院下令中国恒大清算
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Monday ordered the liquidation of China Evergrande Group , a move likely to send ripples through China's crumbling financial markets as policymakers scramble to contain the deepening crisis.翻译:香港一家法院周一下令对中国恒大集团进行清算，此举可能会在中国摇摇欲坠的金融市场中引发连锁反应，因为政策制定者正忙于遏制日益加深的危机。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 俄罗斯军舰在南海进行反潜演习--机构
item.description: Russia's Pacific Fleet frigate Marshal Shaposhnikov has conducted an anti-submarine exercise in the South China Sea, Russian news agency reported on Monday, citing the fleet's press service.翻译:俄罗斯通讯社周一援引俄罗斯太平洋舰队新闻部门的消息称，俄罗斯太平洋舰队“沙波什尼科夫元帅”号护卫舰已在南海进行了反潜演习。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国刺激措施缓解恒大的打击，亚洲股市上涨
item.description: Asian stocks started the week on the front foot, as new steps by Beijing to stabilise the local market outweighed the drag on sentiment from the liquidation of property giant China Evergrande.翻译:亚洲股市本周开盘表现良好，北京方面采取的稳定当地市场的新措施抵消了房地产巨头中国恒大清算对市场情绪的拖累。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 中国医疗器械公司迈瑞计划以9.27亿美元收购亚太医疗
item.description: Chinese medical device company Shenzhen Mindray Bio-Medical Electronics said it planned a 6.65 billion yuan ($927 million) deal to gain control of APT Medical to expand in cardiovascular disease-related businesses.翻译:中国医疗器械公司深圳迈瑞生物医疗电子表示，计划以 66.5 亿元人民币（9.27 亿美元）的交易获得 APT Medical 的控制权，以扩大心血管疾病相关业务。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 投资者关注美联储周繁忙数据，美元持稳
item.description: The dollar started the week on a steady footing as investors took stock of U.S. economic data ahead of the Federal Reserve policy meeting this week, while escalating geopolitical tensions in the Middle East kept a lid on risk sentiment.翻译:美元本周开局稳定，因投资者在本周美联储政策会议之前评估美国经济数据，而中东地缘政治紧张局势升级抑制了风险情绪。
item.author: Ankur Banerjee

item.title: 与顶级债权人谈判破裂后恒大面临迫在眉睫的清算 - 华尔街日报
item.description: Chinese property developer Evergrande faces imminent liquidation after its overseas creditors failed to reach an 11th-hour deal this weekend to restructure the sprawling real-estate company, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:据《华尔街日报》周日援引知情人士的话报道，中国房地产开发商恒大地产面临迫在眉睫的清算，因为其海外债权人未能在本周末的第 11 小时内就重组这家规模庞大的房地产公司达成重组协议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国将把三大资产管理公司并入中国投资有限责任公司-新华社
item.description: China plans to merge three of the nation's biggest bad debt managers into sovereign wealth fund China Investment Corp (CIC) (CIC.UL), state-run Xinhua Finance News reported, as part of a plan to reform financial institutions.翻译:据官方媒体新华社财经报道，作为金融机构改革计划的一部分，中国计划将国内三大坏账管理公司并入主权财富基金中国投资有限责任公司（CIC）（CIC.UL）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 香港法院命令中国恒大清算3000亿美元债务
item.description: A Hong Kong court on Monday ordered the liquidation of property giant China Evergrande Group , a move likely to send ripples through China's crumbling financial markets as policymakers scramble to contain a deepening crisis.翻译:香港一家法院周一下令对房地产巨头中国恒大集团进行清算，此举可能会在中国摇摇欲坠的金融市场中引发连锁反应，因为政策制定者正忙于遏制日益加深的危机。
item.author: Clare Jim, Yu Xie

item.title: 早盘竞价：中国 PMI 和美联储决定将带来更多欢呼
item.description: The Fed's actions and Chair Jerome Powell's press conference will dominate proceedings.翻译:美联储的行动和主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的新闻发布会将主导会议进程。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 中美本周将就芬太尼前体化学品问题举行会议
item.description: The first joint meeting of a U.S.-China working group on fentanyl precursor chemicals will be held on Tuesday in Beijing, a senior U.S. official said on Sunday.翻译:一位美国高级官员周日表示，中美芬太尼前体化学品工作组首次联席会议将于周二在北京举行。
item.author: Kanishka Singh, Steve Holland

item.title: 中国允许菲律宾向争议岛礁派遣部队
item.description: The Chinese coastguard said it had made "temporary special arrangements" to allow the Philippines to deliver supplies to troops at a grounded World War Two-era vessel at a disputed reef.翻译:中国海警表示，已做出“临时特别安排”，允许菲律宾通过一艘停泊在争议礁石上的二战时期船只向部队运送物资。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国法案提出后，中国华大智造、GemPharmatech 为自己辩护
item.description: China's MGI Tech said on Sunday as an upstream equipment provider in the gene sequencing industry, its business does not involve data collection, after a proposed U.S. Biosecure Act included its name in the bill.翻译:中国华大智造周日表示，作为基因测序行业的上游设备提供商，在美国拟议的生物安全法案将其名字纳入法案后，其业务不涉及数据收集。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道，俄罗斯计划建设的通往中国的天然气管道面临施工延误
item.description: Mongolian Prime Minister L. Oyun-Erdene said construction of Russia's planned new Power of Siberia-2 gas pipeline to China, which was expected to start this year, may be delayed, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.翻译:据英国《金融时报》周日报道，蒙古总理奥云额尔登表示，俄罗斯计划于今年启动的通往中国的新西伯利亚力量2号天然气管道的建设可能会被推迟。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国证监会周一起暂停限制性股票借贷
item.description: China's securities regulator said on Sunday that it will fully suspend the lending of restricted shares effective from Monday, in policymakers' latest attempt to stabilise the country's stock markets following recent sharp falls.翻译:中国证券监管机构周日表示，将从周一起全面暂停限制性股票的出借，这是政策制定者在近期股市大幅下跌后稳定股市的最新举措。
item.author: Reuters
